findings.title: EFD - Exclude From Dividend
findings.description: Vulnerability in optimization, leading to inefficient runtime.

findings.title: DDP - Decimal Division Precision
findings.description: Rounding errors due to Solidity's decimal representation.

findings.title: PVC - Price Volatility Concern
findings.description: Potential for huge token swaps, leading to price volatility.

findings.title: MRM - Missing Revert Messages
findings.description: Lack of error messages, making debugging difficult.

findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: Unnecessary use of SafeMath library, increasing complexity and gas consumption.

findings.title: RSK - Redundant Storage Keyword
findings.description: Redundant use of `storage` keyword in view function.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Potential for state variables to be declared as constant, reducing gas consumption.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: Non-compliance with Solidity naming conventions, leading to poor readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L05 - Unused State Variable
findings.description: Unused state variable, increasing contract size and cost of deployment.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: Potential for missing events in event arithmetic, leading to issues with contract functionality.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: Potential dead code, increasing contract size and cost of deployment.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Order of operations issue in arithmetic calculations, potentially leading to loss of precision.

findings.title: L14 - Uninitialized Variables in Local Scope
findings.description: Potential for uninitialized local variables, leading to unpredictable behavior and errors.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Potential for variable shadowing, leading to confusion and unintended consequences.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: Lack of validation in variable setters, potentially leading to issues with contract functionality.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: Potential for incompatible compiler versions, leading to undiscovered bugs and vulnerabilities.

findings.title: L22 - Potential Locked Ether
findings.description: Potential for locked Ether, leading to financial loss.
